verses.plain: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.

tokens.t: Now these
the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.

verses.plain: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

tokens.t: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

verses.plain: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

tokens.t: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

verses.plain: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

tokens.t: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

verses.plain: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.

tokens.t: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.

verses.plain: ¶ And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.

tokens.t: ¶ And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.

verses.plain: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.

tokens.t: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.

verses.plain: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth.

tokens.t: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth.

verses.plain: He was a mighty hunter before the LORD: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the LORD.

tokens.t: He was a mighty hunter before the
: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the

verses.plain: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.

tokens.t: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.

verses.plain: Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,

tokens.t: Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,

verses.plain: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city.

tokens.t: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same
a great city.

verses.plain: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

tokens.t: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

verses.plain: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.

tokens.t: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.

verses.plain: ¶ And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,

tokens.t: ¶ And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,

verses.plain: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,

tokens.t: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,

verses.plain: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

tokens.t: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

verses.plain: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.

tokens.t: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.

verses.plain: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even unto Lasha.

tokens.t: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even unto Lasha.

verses.plain: These are the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries, and in their nations.

tokens.t: These
the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries,
in their nations.

verses.plain: ¶ Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.

tokens.t: ¶ Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were
born.

verses.plain: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.

tokens.t: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.

verses.plain: And the children of Aram; Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.

tokens.t: And the children of Aram; Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.

verses.plain: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.

tokens.t: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.

verses.plain: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.

tokens.t: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one
Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother’s name
Joktan.

verses.plain: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

tokens.t: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

verses.plain: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

tokens.t: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

verses.plain: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

tokens.t: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

verses.plain: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.

tokens.t: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these
the sons of Joktan.

verses.plain: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.

tokens.t: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.

verses.plain: These are the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.

tokens.t: These
the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.

verses.plain: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.

tokens.t: These
the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.

footnotes.text: Dodanim: or, as some read it, Rodanim
went…: or, he went out into Assyria
the city…: or, the streets of the city
